Summary: Two red orbs circled each other and one turned blue
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pasco
There were no other sightings in Pasco on or around February 5th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and myself were driving on road 100 toward the interstate, I noticed two red orbs circling each other. It looked as though the orbs were over road 68 in Pasco. One of the orbs lowered in elevation and turned blue. We kept driving and could not see the orbs.
